00031 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00032 
00033 #include <loos_defs.hpp>
00034 
00035 
00036 
00037 namespace loos {
00038 
00040 
00047   class PeriodicBox {
00048   public:
00049     PeriodicBox() : thebox(99999,99999,99999), box_set(false) { }
00050     explicit PeriodicBox(const GCoord& c) : thebox(c), box_set(true) { }
00051 
00052     GCoord box(void) const { return(thebox); }
00053     void box(const GCoord& c) { thebox = c; box_set = true; }
00054 
00055     bool isPeriodic(void) const { return(box_set); }
00056     void setPeriodic(const bool b) { box_set = b; }
00057 
00058   private:
00059     GCoord thebox;
00060     bool box_set;
00061   };
00062 
00063 
00065 
00072   class SharedPeriodicBox {
00073   public:
00074     SharedPeriodicBox() : pbox(new PeriodicBox) { }
00075     GCoord box(void) const { return(pbox->box()); }
00076     void box(const GCoord& c) { pbox->box(c); }
00077     bool isPeriodic(void) const { return(pbox->isPeriodic()); }
00078 
00079 
00080     SharedPeriodicBox copy(void) const {
00081       SharedPeriodicBox thecopy;
00082 
00083       if (isPeriodic())
00084         thecopy.box(box());
00085     
00086       return(thecopy);
00087     }
00088 
00089   private:
00090     boost::shared_ptr<PeriodicBox> pbox;
00091   };
00092 
00093 }
